title: Adaptive Multimedia Mathematics Education: Short-Intensive Course for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations and statistical concepts
context.additional_context: For working professionals, emphasizing math application skills usable in daily tasks, with personalized content delivery based on individual learning style analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can solve work-related mathematical problems (percent calculations, data analysis, etc.) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can recognize their self-directed learning styles (global/analytical, visual/verbal) and maintain engagement with adaptive content at 80% or higher.
Learners revise learning strategies twice or more per week based on real-time feedback through formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
